definition: horizontal setting (printing)
harsh and unreasonable/unexpected

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: The soldiers are standing in a row.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們正列隊站成一橫排。
橫排孔中心離地面距離。

sentences.english: Now the makeup of books by printing houses has long been changed from vertical linage to horizontal linage .
sentences.chinese: 現在出版社排版書的方式早已從原來的豎排改成橫排。

sentences.english: The emotion beyond poetry could be organized gracefully certain.
sentences.chinese: 詩以外的文字情緒，當然可是橫排混血的很美麗。

sentences.english: The emotion beyond poetry could be organized gracefully for certain.
sentences.chinese: 詩以外的文字情緒當然可以橫排混血的很美麗。
